lines.i: This class contains attributes pertaining to the clinical procedure peformed indentified in this document.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] procedureSummaryCode with data type Code
It contains the summary code for this procedure once it is complete. Possible Values include: Normal, Abnormal, Borderline, Incomplete, etc.

Contains zero or one [0..1] procedureDate with data type Point In Time
The Date/Time when the procedure was performed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] procedureSummaryCode with data type Code
It contains the summary code for this procedure once it is complete. Possible Values include: Normal, Abnormal, Borderline, Incomplete, etc.

Contains zero or one [0..1] procedureDate with data type Point In Time
The Date/Time when the procedure was performed.
